channel.title: [VFM] Town vs Bandits - Randing (13/13)
channel.description:
![image|503x273](upload://bK2rDlbHt5p7HqhRUwTcBlXEHfX.jpeg) ## Town vs Bandits - Hosted and designed by @Wazza and @Geyde, Reviewed by @DatBird
[QUOTE] ## Dagnabbit! Them there bandits have invaded our prestine Town! But we can't figure out who they are, so we've recruited all members of the Town to come together in order to find and enact *justice* upon em! Unfortunately, we entered WIFOM hell and have to out-predict them because our officers are trainees and are terrible at their job. Good luck, we suck. [/QUOTE]
## Mechanics: * Open Setup * 48/24 Phases - Night can be skipped if all players agree, when the day ends may be changed depending when the night is skipped. * The Bandits will speak in either a private thread or private discord depending on what they desire. * The Bandits have a mandatory Factional Kill (if not performed the kill will be randomized among living town players) and a Factional One-Shot Rolecop. * The Bandit Factional Kill and the Bandit Factional One-Shot Rolecop may not be done alongside each other. * Threadmarks will include Final Vote Counts, day starts, night starts and any other important events * Bandits do not flip as their role, instead they flip as Bandit, because that's the only thing we're competent enough to figure out.
## Rules: * Follow the [Global Forum Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) and [Forum Game Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-game-rules/78926). Failure to do so will result in a warning and consequently a force-replace or modkill if needed. * A minimum of 20 content posts are required per day, if it is impossible for you to reach this amount, please inform me beforehand. If you are prodded twice for this, you will be force-replaced or modkilled if needed. If you post no content in a single day that did not end early, you will be force-replaced immediately unless you can provide a good enough reasoning beforehand. * Excessive AtE is frowned upon, don't use it. * Each day, you make make a maximum of 200 posts, on content or not, an hour before EoD this will be lifted. Any posts done after you have reached your post limit will not punish you.
## Voting: * Majority and Plurality are enabled, however on Day 1, Majority is disabled. Which, of course, means there is a Day 1 executed. * If two or more wagons are tied for plurality, a random player between the tied wagons will be executed. * To vote a player, type **/vote [name] @Wazza** otherwise the vote will not count.
## Rolelist:
[QUOTE] [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Tracker**[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Jailkeeper**[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]**Vanilla Town x8**[/COLOR] [COLOR=BROWN]**Bandit Goon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=BROWN]**Bandit Inheriting Ninja**[/COLOR] [COLOR=BROWN]**Bandit Inheriting Strongwilled**[/COLOR] [/QUOTE]
## Rolecards:
[QUOTE] # [COLOR=GREEN]Vanilla Town[/COLOR] Your only abilities are your voice and your vote.
You are practically completely useless in anything you try to accomplish or do in life, your uselessness holds no bounds whatsoever, but that doesn't stop you from enacting your *right* as a citizen to murder people in the name of justice.
*Defeat the Bandits in the name of justice.* [/QUOTE]
[QUOTE] # [COLOR=GREEN]Town Informed Tracker[/COLOR] Each night, you may choose to track a player, you will know who they visit. Your results will be either 'Your target visited [player]', 'Your target didn't visit anyone' or 'No Result'. Additionally, You know that [x] is the [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Jailkeeper**[/COLOR].
After being arrested for committing tax fraud, he was released on set circumstances because he's actually good at not being useless.
*Defeat the Bandits in the name of justice.* [/QUOTE]
[QUOTE] # [COLOR=GREEN]Town Informed Jailkeeper[/COLOR] Each night, you may choose to jail a player. Their action will be roleblocked and they will be protected from nightkills. You may not target the same player consecutively. Additionally, You know that [x] is the [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Tracker**[/COLOR].
Extremely delusional, constantly talks about how the bandits are wolves or mafia for some reason, also calls fellow citizens villagers to go along with this, would be in a mental facility, however he's still one of the only compteent ones.
*Defeat the Bandits in the name of justice.* [/QUOTE]
[QUOTE] # [COLOR=BROWN]Bandit Goon[/COLOR] Your only abilities are your voice and your vote.
You tagged along with your fellow bandits, you're similar to the person who just mouths the words to a song during a choir, you're absolutely pointless, but you're trying your best and that's all that matters. However, your best clearly isn't enough, you're practically useless anyway.
*Have majority of the Town be Bandits or have equal numbers of both.* [/QUOTE]
[QUOTE] # [COLOR=BROWN]Bandit Inheriting Ninja[/COLOR] Your visits are hidden when performing the factional kill. If the Strongwilled dies, you will become immune to roleblocks when performing the factional kill.
Cannot stop screaming about how it isn't just a phase.
*Have majority of the Town be Bandits or have equal numbers of both.* [/QUOTE]
[QUOTE] # [COLOR=BROWN]Bandit Inheriting Strongwilled[/COLOR] You are immune to roleblocks when performing the factional kill. If the Ninja dies, your visits will be hidden when performing the factional kill.
You have no dignity, nothing to lose, so at the end of the day, who cares who you pick and choose.
*Have majority of the Town be Bandits or have equal numbers of both.* [/QUOTE] Flavour Written here will not be used, instead the flavour will be tailored to The Princess Bride. ## Things changed from the previous game (that got canned): [QUOTE] * Players will flip as [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Jailkeeper**[/COLOR], [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Tracker**[/COLOR], [COLOR=GREEN]**Vanilla Town**[/COLOR] or [COLOR=BROWN]**Bandit**[/COLOR] * [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Universal Backup Fruit Vendor**[/COLOR]'s competence got it killed, instead its intelligence spread out to other Citizens...okay nevermind, it only went to the other two Citizens that could actually do things and they became [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Jailkeeper**[/COLOR] and [COLOR=GREEN]**Town Informed Tracker**[/COLOR]. A new [COLOR=GREEN]**Vanilla Town**[/COLOR] also joined the Town to accommodate this. * [COLOR=BROWN]**Bandit Tracker**[/COLOR] learned a new skill but unfortunately lost it's own to gain Bandits a One-Shot Factional Rolecop. [/QUOTE]
## Players: 1. Alice 2. Leafia 3. willtaylor 4. Chloe 5. Marluxion 6. staypositivefriend 7. WindwardAway 8. Vulgard 9. Arctic 10. GGhana 11. EliThePsycho 12. Prophylaxis 13. Emilia
## Backups: 1. Katze 2. Sulit 3. Amelia 4.
## Spectators: 1. DatBird (Uninformed) 2. Marshal (Uninformed) 3. 4. 5.
## Threadmarks:
___ If you have any questions, feel free to ping me and I will answer them.
